articles.content: Hotspots are satellite images with high infrared intensity, indicating sources of high heat, such as forest and land fires. This is up from 38 hotspots reported on Jul 12. articles.content: Speaking to passengers after making a safe landing in Minot just after 8 p.m. “It caught me by surprise. This is not normal at all. I don’t know why they didn’t give us a heads up.”. It’s not a fun day at work,” they continued.
